TopicTitle: Large and tiny size BZ-52 Radial Attachment Point

Articles.Content: I love the BZ-52 Radial Attachment Point. It makes adding multiple small-sized engines to large size fuel tanks a breeze and aesthetically pleasing. Can we get a tiny (probe-sized) and large equivalent of the part? Thanks!
You can try using Cubic Octagonal Struts for tiny ones. Turn them around so they clip inside and all you can see is the attachment point sticking out.
